features.name: Multiattack
features.description: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

features.name: Lightfooted
features.description: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turn.

features.name: Suave Defense
features.description: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its charisma modifier.
